media.description:
A day and a collector's stroll.He goes out from his apartment for a stroll in the park. He walks and sees things in the park unintentionally and these are gathered in his mind one after another.A man reading a newspaper, a kangaroo statue, little flowers blooming in the grass…Those things change their shape and are trimmed, and they stay in the corner of his mind.We see things consciously and unconsciously everyday. How do we memorize things in an ordinary life?

Graduate Work 2010, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

When there are light sources and objects, shadows can be sure there.On the contrary, I assume that you found the shadow. There is an object blocking the light by all means there. The shadow is proof for "There is the object there".If the shadow has disappeared... you should think that the object had disappeared. It is the only reality.

Graduate Work 2010, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

The woman has detached herself from the outside world. Because she doesn't go out, she does not even put on clothes. However, She has run out of the cornflakes that she eats every day.As we get up in the morning and put on clothes, we are alive in a social system.However, even if you escape from the system, the day you have to return will come.

Graduate Work 2010, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

"Googuri Googuri" - a made up word, a secret word, shared by a girl and her grandfather. For the girl, her grandfather is at times like a mountain, at other times like a tree, or an ocean; a warm and comfortable place. Her thoughts take wing into her endless imagination. The things we have seen, smelled, thought, and everything we have experienced, extending and expanding within the infinite expanse inside ourselves.

Graduate Work 2010, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

It is the day of wake of the Grandpa. Grandma is alone in her room looking at the album full of memories with him. “Are you sad, Grandma?,” asks the boy. She replies her grandson merrily with jokes. In the meanwhile she falls asleep and in her dream she meets a man and makes a promise with him….

1st Year Work 2010, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

The Yotsuya Alphabet tells the story of a girl caught in a surreal world through the use of Japanese characters.

Graduate Work 2010, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)
Short film by Takashi Ohashi, visually syncopating music by Onishi Yoshito.
Music video for DECO*27's Vocaloid song "Yowamushi Mont Blanc" featuring Gumi, with animation by akka.
Music video for DECO*27's Vocaloid song "Mosaik Role" featuring Gumi.

There is a stone pillar that continues long and long. Climbers are climbing it. Each climber keeps climbing the stone pillar spending time. They are the symbols of accumulation.

Graduate Work 2010 by Nonaka Akifumi, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

Prize:
2010 Digital Creators Competition 2010, Silver blade prize
2010 16th Campus Genius Award, Entertainment prize
2011 Miyagi, Sendai Animation Grand Prix 2011 Students department, Ａward for Excellence
2011 14th CHOFU Short Film Competition, Incentive award
2011 CREATIVE MARKET TOKYO 2011 Award, Jury's special award

(Source: Geidai Animation)
Music video directed by Mitsuyuki Ishibashi for Crystal Sea Ver. 69 by Intelligent Jazz, a collaborative project formed by Kay Nakayama with drummer Akira Jimbo.

Almost everyone in our contemporary society is picked up and moved by someone or something like a Sugoroku. The first ones to pick us up are "Parents". A boy grows up along a "Sugoroku". This work describes the process of his growth during which he depends on his parents. His family plays the parts of roles in "Sugoroku". His father runs a dice and his mother picks him up, and he goes on his way passively. But until when does this family system like a Sugoroku continue? One day the boy decides to cut off his relationship with his family...

Graduate Work by Tanaka Miki, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

Due to the financial crisis, many factories in China are forced to close their doors in late 2008.

Zhang Xiaojun loses his job in a shoe factory. One day, a supermarket guard beats him up, thinking Zhang is a thief. In vain, he asks the supermarket manager for financial redress. Zhang’s dearest wish is to return to his village and become a farmer. But right before his departure, the police arrest him. The supermarket manager also has his problems. On a moonlit night, the storylines converge in a teahouse near the city rampart.

(Source: Wikipedia)

It’s an underground world. Up on the ground there are many people coming and going. There lives a garbage bag in underground. He has no work, no home and no family. This is a story that a dirty black garbage bag gains a new life through the various experiences.

1st Year Work 2010 by Aki Kono, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

Mix Masters Final Force is the second season of the original mix masters show. In this story, Ditt forgets that he was a mix master. But when the time comes to save the world once again, he finds new friends to help him in his battle against Eva and Babel, the two new antagonists. After the battle, Ditt and his friends meet the true antagonist of the season, Red Knight. They find out that Red knight was once a hero who couldn't resist the taste of power and decided to enslave henches to get more power. He ended up being enslaved by his own core force. When Ditt and his comrades finally defeated him they thought it was over but they had to deal with another big threat: Red Knight had a friend called Blue Fox, also mad due to his mad quest for power. He is trying to obtain the Dark Mix Masters. And another threat appears a white witch claiming to be moreens mother and a evil baby named ruth or root claiming to be moreens little brother,but gets defeated not so easily.In the last few minuets of the last episode were hench and human cant meet again a portal opens from Gamebridge to Atreia Ditt and the others unite again with their henches knowing that the adventure they thought was finished was just the beginning of them being mix masters.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title.userPreferred: Zhuzhu Xia: Jimu Shijie De Tong Hua

media.description:
When GG Bond's grandfather, EE Bond, tries to save the dinosaur from extinction by traveling back 60 million years, he accidentally winds up in the Brick Kingdom, a fairy tale world built by blocks, along with half of the rest of the city. Since they cannot leave, they slowly transform the world with technology like their own. His grandson, GG Bond, follows in his grandfather's footsteps as an Assembler, somebody who can build the blocks of the Brick Kingdom into anything. He uses these skills to fight evil.

(Source: Wikipedia)
A music video for Sleep Warp's song "gene".
A song encouraging people to keep fighting and that everything's okay even when things seem bad like a loss at a game or a getting rejected from a confession.

title.userPreferred: Kaiten Mokuba ni Boku to Neko

media.description: "Encounters" and "farewells" that everyone experiences; when thinking of "farewell", what does the empty heart feel?

During ancient times, the hostile jellyfish-like aliens invaded Earth. One of the genius ape-man possessed the high-technology Dinosaur Configurator and defeated the aliens and saved the world.

In present days, Configuration Technology has changed the entire world. Andy, Toothy and Hero have to defend together with the Super Force the world from the criminal scientist "The Mole" and the Space Jellyfish leader that invaded Earth millions years ago. The Space Jellyfish leader is trapped on Earth for many years and hopes to gain back its energy to conquer Earth again.

Andy and his friends need to train and defend the Earth with their hi-tech robots -- The Configurators!

(Source: CHINAnimax)

One rainy day a boy was waiting sulkily at a bus stop. Pitter-patter, raindrops leap and make waves in a puddle. Watching it, he saw something jumped. When the boy looked into the puddle, there was a red fish swimming. It is a story of a red fish a boy saw on a rainy day.

1st Year Work 2010 by Risa Kimpara, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

After losing a job at the company a man starts working part-time handing out balloons in a rabbit costume. He finds it comfortable to disguise himself in the costume, as nobody would recognize him. Finally he decides to wear the costume all time in daily life. Then the costume becomes a part of his body and confines him inside…

1st Year Work 2010 by Toshiko Hata, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

The protagonist is with friends but bored with the conversation. His mind often slips away to his own imaginary world and comes back to them. So their conversation doesn’t go along very well. In several trips to his own imagination he gradually feels it void and became interested in chain of conversation and the development of the relationship with other people. Then he decided to com back to the conversation.

1st Year Work 2010 by Naoaki Shibuta, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

As dusk closed in, a streetlight in a park was turned on. Moths flew towards the light. Suddenly they stop the motion. Under the streetlight a figure-shape playground equipment appeared and other equipments started to gather around the light. A child strayed among them. It was when the lights gets turned on in the street. As more lights are turned on, the playground equipments stop. Streetlight was turned out.

1st Year Work 2010 by Hiroki Kono, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

The blue evolves. The blue rises toward the upper world. The blue becomes green and then yellow, which makes things unstable. So red circle appears to bring into balance between blue and yellow. These three colors unite into one, which rises until the summit, over the boundary line, and becomes a white circle to a full stop. And then it returns to the first state.

1st Year Work 2010 my YungSung Song, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)
A musical animated film by G9+1, a group of veteran animators. It won the Tokyo Anime Award in 2010.

An old man is trying to create a girl out of his memories. Little by little the doll is being made and given a physical body of machinery parts. The old man makes her as a pure creature, but she denies her identification. The doll demolishes herself, saying, “This is not Me!”

1st Year Work 2010 by Saya Fukase, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

A story about granny, her granddaughter and a goat.

(Source: Official site)

Set mainly in and around the Shanghai Ghetto in Japanese-occupied Shanghai during the Second World War, the film tells the story of three children. Rina and her younger brother Mishalli are Jewish refugees who escaped Europe but are without their parents. A-Gen is a Chinese boy who meets Rina and helps her and her brother to survive. The children form strong friendships and have adventures as they try and fend off the Japanese army occupying the city, and their allies, the Nazis. In the background, the Second Sino-Japanese War takes place, while the children must face the uncertainty that concerns the fate of Rina and Mishalli's parents in Europe.

(Source: AniDB)
Short animation from Miyo Sato.
More short stories featuring Zocco and Minime. The series received the first airing starting November 10, 2010.
Ratio is a girl living in a ice world with his hairy friend Jammon, she will learn various things from the spirits and the people she encounters in every episode.

Can you share the yearning for space? An astronomy boy has grown up into an artist painting the universe, the world of Greek myths including the zodiac, and a variety of scenes with starry sky. The fulldome screen projects his fantastic CG movies. You will also see a live-action movie of the total solar eclipse in 2003 which was observed for the first time in human history in Antarctica. Receive a message from the artist, KAGAYA - "Enjoy science and art." "Chase your dreams!"

(Source: KAGAYA Studio)
The 16th-century shogun Oda Nobunaga wakes up in a high school girl's body.
Third season of the Shimajirou children's television series.
Specials included on the DVDs for the second season.
Flashback revealing the "promise" that Ivis and Crimrose made to each other when they where childhood friends.
The sequel to Kamiusagi Rope, also aired in between commercials at theaters.

The Frogman Company presents, a Tumulus Cinderella Story! Once upon a time, a gentle girl named Coffy lived a life of misery, being treated like trash by her sister-by-law Daniel and her family. Coffy was not allowed to go to the dance party where Prince Charles would choose his bride, but...

NHK's English education program. In Little Charo 2, the puppy journeys with his master through a mysterious place called the Middle World, which lies between the World of the Living and the World of the Dead.

(Source: AniDB)
Pilot film included with the DVD release.

Ghost Messengers are super-power agents from the underground world called the World of Death. The World of Death is a digitalized world with cutting-edge technologies that control and manage the life and death of all living things based on its elaborate systems.

Our Ghost Messenger hero, Kang-lim, has been dispatched to the human world to capture the remaining ghosts who are refusing to go to the World of Death although it is their time.

An accident occurs during his mission and Kang-lim gets captured in his own mobile phone. Little Kang-lim, a human boy who has extraordinary spiritual powers, finds the mobile phone and takes GhostMessenger Kang-lim out from the mobile phone.

And the adventure begins.

(Source: Anime World Network)
The continuation of Penguin no Mondai.

title.userPreferred: Galaxy Express 999: Jikuu wo Koeta Energy no Tabi

media.description:
Five shorts to promote the Japanese electricity company Kyushu Electric Power (Kyuden).

Tetsuro and Maetel visit five interplanetary stops (including Earth) and see how each locale deals with energy.

title.userPreferred: Ago Nashi Gen to Ore Monogatari

media.description: Gen is a 32-year-old man who runs a small shipping company. He has nothing to be proud of except his thick body hair. Without money, status, or virtue, he struggles to succeed—only to fail in the end.

title.userPreferred: Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf: The Tiger Prowess

media.description:
Crafty Gecko and General Tiger attack the Goat Village with plans to build an amusement park. Even worse, they intend to turn the castle of Wolfie (Grey Wolf) and his wife, Wolnie (Red Wolf) into a public toilet! To save their captured families from the fierce animal gang and robot soldiers, Weslie (Pleasant Goat) and Wolfie must work together to find the legendary statues that protected their ancestors. Can they beat the villains and become friends?

(Source: Wikipedia)

Tachikawa Himeko is a plain high school girl. One day, a handsome boy Mikami Tochiotome starts to lodge at her house. He likes to dress in drag and his fashion awakes Himeko to sense of beauty.

Note: The episodes were included in "Ciao Ciao TV! (ちゃおちゃおTV!)", a bonus DVD bundled in select issues of the shoujo magazine Ciao.

A parody of Doraemon.

Din Dong, a common cat which pretends to be magical, accompanies his useless masters and his friends in Hong Kong.

title.userPreferred: MonHun Nikki Girigiri Airuu Mura: Airuu Kiki Ippatsu OVA

media.description: Two unaired episodes included with the Blu-ray and the DVD.
